reviewText: I was intrigued by the addition of CBT with VR to overcome phobias.\nRegarding this adaption, I was left a bit underwhelmed. I was expecting more levels of spiders and to see them gradually start crawling on my arms and over my face all while trying to remain calm.\nI think with further development and graphic enhancement, there really is something for science here. I encourage the developpers to continue working with this concept.

One of the things I really like about this experience is that I have the choice to set the pace and intensity myself. You can make it as scary as you want and only go up a level when you feel you are ready for it.

I 'm a - almost graduated - psychologist and I have to say that I like the quality of this experience because of the responsibility you have yourself during the construction of the exposure.

Because it felt so real to me, I really believe that it reflects an intense experience .

Well done :)
